title: RTRT

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Cook chili for a player at night, giving them Invincible defence as long as they do not use any abilities during that phase.
- Cook curry for a player at night, making their ability unable to fail no matter what for this night and the next.
- Attempt to reconstruct a dead player twice per game at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Reconstructed players are made alive again, but cannot speak in any day chats and will be dealt an invincible attack at the end of every night, except for the first one following their revival.
- You may only use one ability per night.
- Effects of food are unaffected by your death.
